name: UpdateProjectBriefAsana
description:
Update an Asana project brief.

Use this tool to update an existing Asana project brief. Specify only the fields to be updated; fields not specified will remain unchanged. Returns the complete updated project brief record.

parameters.name: project_brief_id
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the specific project brief to update.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the project brief.

parameters.name: updated_project_brief_fields
parameters.description: The fields to update in the project brief, formatted as a JSON object.

value_schema.description: The updated fields for the project brief.

parameters.name: include_optional_properties
parameters.description: Specify a list of properties to include in the response, separated by commas.

value_schema.description: This endpoint returns a resource which excludes some properties by default. To include those optional properties, set this query parameter to a comma-separated list of the properties you wish to include.

parameters.name: provide_pretty_output
parameters.description: If true, the response is formatted with line breaks and indentation for readability. Use primarily for debugging.

value_schema.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the asana API.

parameters.description:

value_schema.description:

parameters.name: opt_fields
parameters.description: This endpoint returns a resource which excludes some properties by default. To include those optional properties, set this query parameter to a comma-separated list of the properties you wish to include.

value_schema.description: This endpoint returns a resource which excludes some properties by default. To include those optional properties, set this query parameter to a comma-separated list of the properties you wish to include.

parameters.name: project_brief_gid
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the project brief.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the project brief.

parameters.name: requestBody
parameters.description: The updated fields for the project brief.

value_schema.description: The updated fields for the project brief.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
